name: Competency Objects
description: The Competency Objects Brightspace Data Set returns the competencies and learning objectives which have been created within your organization. Returned Fields

columns.name: ObjectId
columns.description: Unique competency or learning objective ID

columns.name: ReadyForEvaluation
columns.description: Is flagged as ready for evaluation

columns.name: Status
columns.description: Status of competency: Draft, In Review, Approved, Archived. Field can be null.

columns.name: Description
columns.description: Competency or learning objective description. Field can be null.

columns.name: NeedReevaluation
columns.description: Flag indicating if the competency or learning objective needs to be reevaluated

columns.name: ReevaluationIfAchieved
columns.description: Determines if reevaluation will occur when the competency or learning objective is updated and the competency or learning objective has already been achieved. Field can be null.

columns.name: ReevaluationIfNotAchieved
columns.description: Determines if reevaluation will occur when the competency or learning objective is updated and the competency or learning objective has not been achieved. Field can be null.

columns.name: AdditionalIdentifier
columns.description: Additional competency or learning objective identifier. Field can be null.

columns.name: IsHidden
columns.description: Indicates if the competency is hidden to consumers.
